title: Do classes started for kcet 2nd round students in pes ec campus cs branch
content:
Do they make them seperate section or alloted with round 1 students
Or waiting for round 3 students

comments.body: I've heard they make separate sections for r2 and r3 people. After the first sem, they'll be in the same sections as other students.
Classes started for R2 in pes yesterday
It started today my guy , one of my friend who got into ec campus via kcet r2 came today
U came like that only no lol

For actual round 2 ppl (no pessat ppl) it started today
